name: Bretman's Orthorexia nervosa Questionnaire
interpretation: There are a total of 10 points in the questionnaire, the maximum number of points that can be scored is 10. If the respondent scored 4 points or more, they may have a PROBLEM and need to consult a specialist.

questions.question: I spend more than three hours a day thinking about healthy eating
I plan the menu for tomorrow today
For me, the benefits of food are much more important than those who enjoy it
The better my diet, the more monotonous my lifestyle
My dietary restrictions are getting stricter every day
I sacrifice activities that I used to enjoy if they prevent me from eating properly
My self-esteem increases when I eat healthy food. I look down on those who don't
I am tormented by feelings of guilt and self-loathing if I eat something that gives me pleasure, but does not comply with the rules of my diet
The diet isolates me from others, because I can only eat at home
When I eat the right foods, I am calm and feel like I have everything under control
